mapper.sql: ID, NAME, PASSWORD, ROLE, CREATETIME, CREATENAME, EMOLUMENT
mapper.select: SELECT NAME FROM cd_user where name= #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into cd_user (ID, NAME, PASSWORD, ROLE, CREATETIME, CREATENAME, EMOLUMENT) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emolument,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into cd_user (NAME, PASSWORD, ROLE, CREATETIME, CREATENAME) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR},str_to_date(#{datetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') , #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into cd_user
ID,
NAME,
PASSWORD,
ROLE,
CREATETIME,
CREATENAME,
EMOLUMENT,

mapper.update:
update cd_user
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATENAME = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMOLUMENT = #{emolument,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cd_user set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATENAME = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMOLUMENT = #{emolument,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
